QueryList.Query: FROM Notice A WHERE 1=1 <#if id??> <#if like??> and A.id like '%'||:id||'%' <#else> and A.id=:id </#if> </#if> <#if receiver??> <#if like??> and A.receiver like '%'||:receiver||'%' <#else> and A.receiver=:receiver </#if> </#if> <#if senderID??> <#if like??> and A.senderID like '%'||:senderID||'%' <#else> and A.senderID=:senderID </#if> </#if> <#if msg??> <#if like??> and A.msg like '%'||:msg||'%' <#else> and A.msg=:msg </#if> </#if> <#if sender??> <#if like??> and A.sender like '%'||:sender||'%' <#else> and A.sender=:sender </#if> </#if> <#if receiverID??> <#if like??> and A.receiverID like '%'||:receiverID||'%' <#else> and A.receiverID=:receiverID </#if> </#if> <#if status??> <#if like??> and A.status like '%'||:status||'%' <#else> and A.status=:status </#if> </#if>
